name: Unknown

quirks.name: Fluent Gardener
quirks.description: A fully realized 'Gardener' who has mastered his connection to 'The Seed'. Possesses para-natural abilities including empathy, precognition, and potential teleportation or non-local presence.

vulnerabilities: Bound by unknown rules or paradoxes
Seems unable to act directly, relying on Turing as the primary agent
key_quote: You can't learn about the soil from a book.
narrative_arc: Having delivered his critical message and revealed the true nature of the game, the Nightingale agent has stepped back into the shadows. His arc is one of a mentor and guide, observing Turing's progress and waiting for the next critical moment to intervene.
